mapper.select: select p.pid, p.bno, b.bname, p.clarge, p.cmedium, p.csmall, p.pname, p.pprice, p.pdetail, c.ccolorcode, c.cimage1, c.cimage2, c.cimage3, c.cimage4, c.cimage5, c.cimage6 from product p join brand b on p.bno = b.bno join color c on p.pid = c.pid where p.pid=#{pid} AND c.ccolorcode=#{ccolorcode}
select pid, ccolorcode,ccolorname, ccolorimage, cimage1, cimage2, cimage3, cimage4, cimage5, cimage6 from color where pid=#{pid}

select distinct(s.ssize), c.pid, c.ccolorcode, c.ccolorname, s.samount from color c join stock s on c.pid = s.pid AND c.ccolorcode=#{ccolorcode} where c.pid=#{pid} ORDER BY CASE s.ssize WHEN 'XXS' THEN 0 WHEN 'XS' THEN 1 WHEN 'S' THEN 2 WHEN 'M' THEN 3 WHEN 'L' THEN 4 WHEN 'XL' THEN 5 WHEN 'XXL' THEN 6 END ASC, to_number(REGEXP_REPLACE(s.ssize, '[^0-9]'))
select p.pid, pname, pprice, (select bname from brand b where b.bno=p.bno) as bname, c.cimage1, c.cimage2 from product p join color c on p.pid = c.pid
select pid, bname, clarge, cmedium, csamll, pname, pprice, pdetail, c.cimage1, c.cimage2 from product p join color c on p.pid = c.pid where bname= #{bname}

select distinct ssize from stock where pid=#{pid} ORDER BY CASE ssize WHEN 'XXS' THEN 0 WHEN 'XS' THEN 1 WHEN 'S' THEN 2 WHEN 'M' THEN 3 WHEN 'L' THEN 4 WHEN 'XL' THEN 5 WHEN 'XXL' THEN 6 END ASC, to_number(REGEXP_REPLACE(ssize, '[^0-9]'))
